mapper.insert: insert into authority (id, name, descr, by1, by2) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{descr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{by1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{by2,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: select id, name, descr, by1, by2 from authority
